Title: Postcode Load Utility
Description: A WPF utility to load the UK Post Office postcode files to a SQL Server database table.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A WPF utility to load the UK Post Office postcode files to a SQL Server database table.

This project uploads the Post Office PAF files (not supplied) to a SQL Server Database

For an explanation of what a post code is, please see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Postal_codes_in_the_United_Kingdom
